articles.title: Falling sales, job losses and bankruptcies: Pain spreads across coal country
articles.description: President Donald Trump promised he would save the US coal industry. But as his tenure winds down, the industry is struggling through some of its darkest days, plagued by falling demand, bankruptcies and job losses.

articles.title: Starbucks names Mellody Hobson board chair — the first Black woman in the role
articles.description: Starbucks has named Mellody Hobson the new chair of its board of directors, the first Black woman in that role at the company.

articles.author: Drew Kann, CNN
articles.title: Human-made materials may now outweigh all living things on Earth, report finds
articles.description: A new study published Wednesday finds that manmade mass may now outweigh all biomass on Earth, a significant milestone that speaks to the enormous impact that humans have had on the planet.

articles.title: How social media sites are tackling vaccine misinformation
articles.description: CNN's Donie O'Sullivan tells us about the dangers of coronavirus vaccine misinformation online and how social media sites like Facebook and YouTube are pledging to combat this growing dilemma.

articles.author: Mary Ilyushina and Lianne Kolirin, CNN
articles.title: Thieves burglarize Russia's nuclear war 'doomsday' plane
articles.description: Russian police are investigating a break-in at a top-secret airborne nuclear command center, nicknamed the "doomsday plane."

articles.title: Watch surfers tackle 'monster' waves in California
articles.description: California surfers were stunned by 30 to 40-foot waves and reportedly perfect weather conditions at Mavericks Beach, a spot south of San Francisco that has been called a premiere break for big wave surfing.
